languages.text: {n}Вы отбрасываете от себя руку сервитора — и тот издает пронзительный скрежет. Остальные выпрямляются и с невыносимым скрежетом начинают двигаться к вам.{/n}
{n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы отбрасываете от себя руку сервитора — и тот издает пронзительный скрежет. Остальные выпрямляются и с невыносимым скрежетом начинают двигаться к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The rest straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance toward you.{/n}
{n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The rest straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance toward you.{/n}
{n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The rest straighten and with the same unbearable screeching advance toward you.{/n}
{n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The rest straighten and with the same unbearable screeching advance toward you.{/n}
{n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}
{n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你猛地拍开了机仆的手，那只手发出了刺耳的尖锐声音。其他机仆也挺直了身子，发出了同样令人难以深受的尖锐声音，朝你冲了过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你猛地拍开了奴工的手，那只手发出了刺耳的尖锐声音。其他奴工也挺直了身子，发出了同样令人难以深受的尖锐声音，朝你冲了过来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apartas de un golpe la mano del servidor y emite un chillido perforante. Los otros servidores se enderezan y, con el mismo chirrido insoportable, avanzan hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apartas de un golpe la mano del servidor y emite un chillido perforante. Los otros servidores se enderezan y, con el mismo chirrido insoportable, avanzan hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターの手をはたくと、それは鋭い金切り声を上げた。他のサーヴィター達は姿勢を正し、同じく耐え難い金切り声を上げてこちらへ向かってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターの手をはたくと、それは鋭い金切り声を上げた。他のサーヴィター達は姿勢を正し、同じく耐え難い金切り声を上げてこちらへ向かってくる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du schlägst die Hand des Servitors zur Seite – woraufhin er durchdringend kreischt. Die übrigen Servitoren richten sich auf und nähern sich dir mit dem gleichen unerträglichen Kreischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du schlägst die Hand des Servitors zur Seite – woraufhin er durchdringend kreischt. Die übrigen Servitoren richten sich auf und nähern sich dir mit dem gleichen unerträglichen Kreischen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous repoussez la main du servitor... qui lâche alors un cri perçant. Ses congénères se redressent et se dirigent vers vous en poussant le même hurlement insupportable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous repoussez la main du servitor... qui lâche alors un cri perçant. Ses congénères se redressent et se dirigent vers vous en poussant le même hurlement insupportable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör, eline vurulunca kulak delen bir çığlık atıyor. Diğer hizmetörler de doğrulup aynı dayanılmaz çığlıklarla sana doğru ilerlemeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bat the servitor's hand away — and it lets out a piercing screech. The other servitors straighten and, with the same unbearable screeching, advance on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitör, eline vurulunca kulak delen bir çığlık atıyor. Diğer servitörler de doğrulup aynı dayanılmaz çığlıklarla sana doğru ilerlemeye başlıyor.{/n}
